Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: This place is almost too good to be true, and I would prefer to keep it a secret. ;) But as business they deserve new clients and more stars! Go and enjoy: coffee, bites, good vibes and very friendly service. Y

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: I came here with one friend and two infants. The staff was really welcoming. They set up a swing for my baby so that she would not get bored, and they gave us some bread for the babies to chew on. The red wine was also tasty.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: You know those places where the owner and the staff enjoy what they do? Well this is one of them. Such good vibes! Amazing service, detailed nice tips about the menu, and hey that deli shop is very cool. It was the first time there for me but definitely will be more. You deserve more stars, please keep it that way! ðŸ™Œ

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Amazing spot with great fresh food and an amazing herb fridge! The sandwiches here are delectable and they serve great coffee with different milk options. The decor is so cozy and they have outdoor seating too. Highly reccommend!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: My friend and I went here after visiting Micropia and it was lovely! The staff were super friendly and helpful and gave great recommendations! We got the fries with chicken and it was really tasty. Iâ€™d definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants some food before or after visiting the ARTIS park or Micropia.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: We accidently entered this lovely deli shop! Overwhelmed with all the delicious foods to buy.. we decided to go for food. En we did not regret that!! Wow such an amazing menu, wanted to eat everything  !!we really wished for a place like â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Everything looks good,  service was terrible however,  seems the staff prioritises chatting to random people instead of delivering it's orders,  after asking again for a coffee after 5 minutes it took another 5 minutes and we decided to â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text:
Borrl Kitchen has one of the most delicious cold meat and cheese in town.
Recommended to visit if you are in the area and like to spend time enjoying the day.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Really loved this place!! It's really nice <3

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Went there after visiting Artis with my family â€¦ flammekuche was excellent, the soup fresh and spicy, my children loved their fries with chicken, and coffee + desserts were the cherry on the cake ! A really nice place with correct prices in Amsterdam ðŸŒŸ

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Really nice waiter, cozy and nice place to have good beer and great popcorn! Definitely coming back!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Great customer service! The lady serving us was really friendly and the food was excellent. The indoor and outdoor sining space had a great atmosphere.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: I used to live close by and it was my favourite spot to grab a coffee. The staff is super friendly and they have great products, good music and the food is great as well.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: I Highly recommend this place for lunch! The quality of the food is amazing and the ambiance is so unique. Loved it!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text:
Very nice restaurant

We actually came there by accident. â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Great place for food and drinks any time of the day! The borrl platter is perfect for sharing. We had dinner with a group and the menu suited all (vegan, meat lovers and lactose intolerant). Service was friendly and fast, though allowing â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Wonderful place with top notch service and great food options in a laid back set up.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Very rich and flavorsome food, very friendly service, cozy atmosphere. Strongly recommend the Serrano flammkuchen with egg, rosemary cheese sandwich with mango chutney and red velvet macaroon.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: The very first I've visited during my stay in Amsterdam. A great and unique place when comparing with all the rest I've paid a visit. Top quality service that keeps an eye on every visitor. The plate with plethora of different dishes is what I've enjoyed the most.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Great place for a borrel. The only dissapointment was that the veggies for the cheese fondue were cold and that kind of spoiled the whole thing. Otherwise very tasty and good atmosphere! Pictures by Manon ;-)

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Super chilled and cozy. My friend and I shared a fish platter and sweet potato fries. If you come for dinner like us, at first glance, they may not seem to offer so many options, but no! Do order a plate because it's really diverse and from â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Casual and relaxed. Nice Coffee and tasty pecan pie

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Food was delicious although the service was a little slow. But otherwise it's a great place to chill with friends!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Very nice place, delicious cakes, great atmosphere and friendly staff!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Cosy, friendly, pretty and relax. There is a nice selection of beers, wines and cocktails available. All the food looks great and the portions are super generous. Felt really welcome and had a good night.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Delicious food, good selection of beers, friendly staff, great music and good value

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Nice place, personally I liked the atmosphere and menu design. I recommend trying the White chocolate cake with raspberry (its actually a cheesecake but they called white chocolate cake) ;)

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: A restaurant with a great ambient but not so great food. As with most restaurants in the Netherlands of Dutch origin, the food falls flat in terms of palate but ranks high in presentation.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: The food was amazing! Me and my colleagues had the Borrl boxes delivered over to us and we were more than happy with what we got. The snacks were homemade, fresh and of high quality. Perfect with wine or beer. We were all satisfied perfectly and we will definitely be back!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Great little Deli. Stopped here for a coffee and pastry after Micropia and both were delicious. The Pasteis De Nata especially, which we were told were shipped in from Portugal. â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Great place, amazing food and awesome service ðŸ‘ðŸ¾

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: The place is very beautiful and cozy. That kind of place that the ambience makes difference. The staff very polite and helpful. The food taste very good with a fair price. Nothing to complain.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Friendly and highly skilled staff, in an unique setting with amazing customer service and delicious food. Definitely a cool hangout for breakfast, lunch, dinner and/or late drinks.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: The atmosphere and decoration as well as the service was great!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Awesome place! Delicious delicacies, pies and drinks. Yesterday tried one of the ginger beers with a cheesecake, can definitely recommend those!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text:
Really excellent!
I never write reviews. Can't be bothered. But my wife and I loved this place. We loved that it's not too big and loved the sharing starter and dessert platters. â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: The most friendly staff - offering exquisite food and drinks. 13/10 would recommend!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: We were the only people in the place. It was a little cold but waiter was friendly. I had to change my order but he handled it well. Beers on offer were excellent.  Food very good, would recommend it, just across from the zoo so obviously will be busy during the day.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text:
Great food with very well and thoughtfully combined ingredients! A cool Borrel and Lunch spotðŸ¹
I am definitely coming back!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Its a very cozy and nice place, we had a great conversation with the owner, got some free delicious cookies and enjoyed the home made lemonade with herbs. The fries were really good and we will come again!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Used to like coming here, everyone was attentive and giving tips and ideas of what to try out etc... but the last few times the staff has been rude. Guess they are doing pretty good in the pandemic that they feel they don't need regulars to keep coming... a shame.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Great vibe. Nice (if limited) menu. Tasty food. Cold beer. Who could ask for more?

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Amazing sandwiches and homemade juices in one of the best places in the neighborhood! The staff is friendly and welcoming, ingredients are mostly local and of the highest quality. Will definitely come back for more!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text:
Good customer service, nice quiet place.
Lovely food, nice and chilled music played in the background. Would defenetley go back!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Great location and great atmosphere! Had a realy good breakfast!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Very cool chilled place just off Plantage. Great loaded fried and selection of beers

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: After an afternoon at the Artis zoo, it was a good spot to rest our legs. However, maybe not the best option with a kid. Among friends it would be a good spot to chill out. Service wise, have to be patient. But I don't blame on the team, â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Cozy place with a nice selection of wines and snacks (hapjes in Dutch). Mostly local crowd, away from the beaten track.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE everything about Borll kitchen deli and the changes they were able to put forward since the start of Covid. Ordered super nice BORRL boxes to go with high quality products that were received well with all colleagues. â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Food was really good, the staff was nice and happy to help! Would definitely eat there again.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Great service, great food, fair prices. All around fantastic!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Great location and great atmosphere! The serve nice food during the full day. Breakfast, lunch and dinner. They have also great wines. A nice place to stay, can really recommend it! â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Great rustic atmosphere, lovely to sit outside on a sunny day. The staff was friendly and he food was DELICIOUS. I had the vegetarian aubergine "caviar" sandwich and it was divine â€“ the whole menu looked so good I'll be going back for breakfast tomorrow. Highly recommend!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Lovely place, we called on the day to come with a group of 20 in the evening, which is a big group for this cosy place (and a group of 20 would be difficult to place anywhere on the day itself), but the people are Borrl Kitchen were very â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Perfect for lunch! Really nice sandwiches and awesome limonade! Also the staff is very friendly and explains everything or gives recommendations. Will come back for sure!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Burger was well made, but very strange taste, almost like a cheap BBQ sauce, ruined the taste. Water carafe had visible mold growing inside (very small amount but still). French fish was good as were the fries, and excellent service.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Cozy and relaxing. Food took a bit to deliver, not excessive but a little slow. Service was quite nice, friendly and available. Special requests were fine, in this case scrambled eggs instead of over easy. My flat white coffee was perfectly â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Converted into a local deli store with a constant new assortment. Definitely worth a visit. Try the GlÃ¼hgin, which is like warm liquid apple pie with gin :)

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: I ordered savoury pancakes there... They came literally runny in the middle and when I asked to get them done again, they just heated them up making them very stodgy and not really nice. Bacon by that time got cold. On the plus side, nice tea and my partner had a lovely English breakfast. Nice atmosphere, not a great service.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Be warry of the prices here, I'm not sure if it's because I'm a tourist they bumped the prices up, or if they genuinely are that expensive. We stopped off just to have a quick drink on our way home from the zoo. 4 500ml glasses of Leffe â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Great for lunch or dinner when visiting Artis Zoo but definitely also worth a detour. This is fresh, honest food. I had the chef's burger twice now and had two different but positive experiences because different ingredients were used. My â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Very nice place with delicious food.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Just ok. The burger meat was only a bought one. Not really good. The fries were ok but not special. And the waiters forgot each time one of the ordered things... dinner should have startet at 17:00 but we could order at 17:40 and were â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: First meal on our first trip to Amsterdam and it was incredible, couldn't recommend it more to anyone

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: This place is a great find!  Remi is such a friendly guy.  He offered us tons of advice for local restaurants for our weekend.  I hadnâ€™t had many of the beers that they offered and he spoke to me about the different options and let me try â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Order a drink and watch the rest of the world pass by while you enjoy a delicious sharing platter (or two!) in relaxed style. A good variety of tasty food and engaging staff, set in an enchanting part of the city. Borrl Kitchen is ideally located opposite Artis Zoo and Micropia and nearby the Botanical Gardens. Highly recommended.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Casual place with good food options to share, like the Flammkuchen and the fries. A few non trivial beer on tap options too, like La Trappe and Punk IPA. Good cost benefit.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Amazing service and great for little kids too!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Cute little gem next to the zoo in Amsterdam

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: If you look for a relaxed spot & want to hang-out with the locals, this is the place to be! My husband and I visited Borrl Kitchen on a Sunday afternoon; place was nicely busy and live music playing. We shared some dishes and had great â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Nice food but quite expensive with small portions and very slow service.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: The best lunch we had in Amsterdam!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Walked in expecting pretty good food, got amazing dishes! The setting is cool too, but really everything is so good. Would definitely eat there again

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Really lovely breakfast enjoyed outside before spending the day at the artis nearby. Lovely food and coffee, great service and beautiful cafe. Thanks for having us!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Good service and atmosphere, inexpensive and had a delicious assortment of beer.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Reserved a table and turned up to be told that we had to sit at a bar. Not a problem but the bar was surrounded by upturned chairs. Asked the waiter to move the chairs so we could sit. The waiter proceeded to clutch his own head and then â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Was leaving the Verzetsmuseum(Resistance Museum) around lunchtime headed for the tram when I walked by Borri kitchen and people seated outside were eating lunch and it looked fantastic so I went in and what a little gem of a restaurant. â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Very nice new and cosy place. Just across the street of artis zoo. We went here on Sunday night and there was live music, which was awesome! We order the borrl platter with amazing chorizo croquettes. Wow! The chicken is great and the â€¦

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Reminded me of the lounge bars in the UK. I feel their timing for the menu is needlessly complex. We arrived at 3ish and found we couldn't order half the stuff on the menu because of their timings. Happily go back again at the right time to try the other bits though.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Good vibes and many specialities!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Stumbled across this place in our last night in Amsterdam! A great find - great burger, excellent and cheery service and good vibes! Would definitely recommend to anyone!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Really cool place. Suggest to everyone

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Adorable host, abordable price and excellent food !

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Great food and a beautiful place to eat. Not quite sure how Djordy the Dutch Dining Dynamo keeps the place running (on his own when went) but he made the breakfast very pleasurable.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Warm welcoming from the lovely waitress and the team.. weâ€™ve had the grilled chicken sandwich highly recommendable and the gazooz was good ...

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Excellent place! The food was top quality and the signature Gazoz was delicious! Great atmosphere and service. A real Amsterdam gem!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Nice toast, friendly service - but no flexibility to accomodate the splitting of the bill. We were five people and needed to each pay our own part - not possible

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Super friendly and helpful.  Amazing food with original flavor profiles.  Highly recommended.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Another hit restaurant from our trip to Amsterdam this week. Great staff, atmosphere, and food. Perfect place to blow off some steam and enjoy a good meal!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Great hospitality the owner and staff are very friendly and nice to chat too. Food was tasty and presented well. The vibe was gezellig and the live music was a great end to the day! :)

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Good food - super friendly service - nice place to hang out. Only thing I would change is adding roasted chicken instead of boiled to the Cesar salad

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Must go place if you are in the area. The atmosphere is cozy and fun, the food is really good and the service is great. Amsterdam needs more places such as Borrl.  This place is an example for many lunch rooms and restaurants.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Friendly staff, nice variety of beers and snacks and above all a very cozy place. Highly recommend going there if you want to eat, drink and relax for a couple of hours.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Loved our visit to Borrl Kitchen, great staff and the best pumpkin soup ever! Highly recommend a visit here, I canâ€™t wait to go back.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text:
Funny Amsterdam's pub in front of the Artis Zoo.

Very clean bathroom and funny staff, expecially Djordy!
We ate very good food such as an English breakfast and a tasty sandwich!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Couldn't say anything on taste never achieved to even order... When we repeatedly tried we were rudely told they were too busy preparing drinks to take orders. Apparently staff too incompetent to handle 8 tables in the small shop. Left after 20 minutes of not being able to order

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Really friendly staff and great food! The waiter even gave us an umbrella to take as it started raining when we were in there.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Great Service an Great Food&Drinks.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Bland food and poor service. Starters and mains arrived at the exact same time! Definitely avoid the vegan burger and sweet potato fries.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text:
Very nice Restaurant/CafÃ© across the Zoo.

Definitely coming back to this place.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: very friendly bar/cafÃ© where we had a good coffee and a drink. Place is very well designed and the staff was great as well.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text:
Good beer and perfect food!
They have a smiling weiter, have a tables on the street. And they gave chewing gum to me :3

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Nice and chill place, the waitresses were nice to us. The service was a little slow but maybe we were too hungry hehe.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Good food, nice staff and very cozy!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: It always a delicious surprise to have food from Borrl. I highly recommend the borrl boxes. :)

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Lovely place, great atmosphere and conveniently located right next to the zoo. I'll definitely go for lunch again after my next zoo visit!

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Food was good but service was awful. Everyone except one lady are unprofessional, slow and impolite. They brought us wrong food and drinks.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Very good food and ambiance !

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Amazing burger! Such weird combinations of flavours but it is so tasty! Very young casual place.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: The waiter was nice. The food took forever because they ran out of batter. Then the cook got a nasty attitude.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: It's a little Restaurant a cross the Artis. Very good food and the staff was funny & friendly.  You really should try out this cool place......

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: The vegan burger was good, nothing exceptional. The fries that came with the hamburger were very good.

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
Review Text: Food was good, service was fantastic! Prices were a bit more than what I would have paid for the taste

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen

Name: Amsterdam Borrl Kitchen
